description: Although Logic apps has a rich set of 40+ connectors for a variety of services, you may want to call into your own custom API that can run your own code. One of the easiest and most scalable ways to host your own custom Web API's is to use App Service. This template deploys a Web app for your Custom API and secures it using AAD auth.
summary: Logic app calls into a Custom API hosted on App Service and protected by AAD
